name: Penguin Slide
description:
Penguin Slide was a school project/exam that we handed in for our 3D programming exam our second semester as Game Development students in Norway.

It is a multiplayer game, where you can pick between two modes, game mode or free play.
In free play you can move around as you like to check out the intractable in the game.
In game mode you play vs the other player to catch a certain amount of fish and then give it to the queen. First player to do this wins.
